text: Woodlands MRT station (NS9/TE2) is an above-ground Mass Rapid Transit (MRT) station on the North South Line and Thomson-East Coast Line in Woodlands, Singapore. It is located next to the Woodlands Temporary Bus Interchange and Causeway Point. ==History== In 1990, the government of Singapore said that the North South Line will be extended to connect the already-opened Choa Chu Kang and Yishun stations. The station opened on 10 February 1996 as part of this extension. The section on the Thomsonâ€“East Coast Line opened on 31 January 2020, as part of Stage 1 of the line. ==References== ==Other websites== ==Related pages== *Mass Rapid Transit (Singapore) Category:Mass Rapid Transit (Singapore) stations Category:Establishments in Singapore Category:Woodlands, Singapore Category:1996 establishments in Asia Category:2020 establishments in Asia Category:21st-century establishments in Singapore
title: Woodlands MRT station
